lines: I'm sorry. In order to play through this icon, you need a steady job. You may go to the WORK ICON and apply for one, then return.

You and a close work associate have to take a trip out of town together. He is married. While the two of you are out to dinner, he mentions that he would like to go out on the town and "live it up" with a few women. Going along with him
might mean a profitable increase in your Vocational sphere.
He asks why you don't want to go with him. How do you respond?
#TELL HIM THAT YOU DON'T WANT TO CHEAT ON YOUR WIFE OR LOVER
#TELL HIM THAT YOU DON'T THINK IT IS RIGHT FOR HIM TO CHEAT ON HIS WIFE

"That's reasonable," he says with a chuckle, "but DOWNRIGHT STUPID! HAR! HAR! I'M GOING TO GET ME SOME BABES!" You return to your hotel room and try to get some rest. At about 3 a.m., your associate brings home some ladies of the evening
and offers to share them with you.
#GET ANGRY AND TELL THEM ALL TO GET THE %$@$Q OUT
#QUIETLY TELL THEM TO GET THE *&#%%$ OUT
#LEAVE THE ROOM AND FIND SOMEPLACE ELSE TO SLEEP

"Let's not get testy," he says. The three of them leave the room. He returns fifteen minutes later and $1000 poorer. It evidently didn't take much to satisfy him. He resents you for the rest of the trip. You'll probably want to avoid going

The women giggle and your associate tries again to convince you. It doesn't work. The three of them leave the room. He returns fifteen minutes later and $1000 poorer. It evidently didn't take much to satisfy him. He resents you for the
rest of the trip. You'll probably want to avoid going away with this fellow again.
#GET ANGRY AND TELL THEM ALL TO GET THE %&$@ OUT
How could you let that joker interfere with your nice peaceful night's sleep? I'm surprised at you.
The girls want an additional $500 to fool around with you. Do you still want to do it?
The girls are sexual acrobats. You have a wild time. The hotel bed groans and squeaks from the evening's activities.
When the dust settles, you begin thinking about the love of your life. How do you feel?
Three hours of pleasure may turn into a painful and embarrassing memory that lingers for a lifetime. Do you think you will ever admit to what you have done?
You must really want to be punished for what you've done.
I hope you are not the type who talks in his sleep.
Let me ask you something. How would you feel if you found out that the love of YOUR life pulled the same kind of stunt on you?
Sure, "No problem." Tell me another one.
That's a nice, understanding response. You can get carried away with your impulses, but she's not allowed to get carried away with hers.
He resents your self-righteous attitude about things. The trip proceeds poorly. You resent him and he resents you.
The two of you meet some girls who turn out to be "ladies of the evening." They want $500 to service you for the night. Do you still want to go for it?
The two of you are like lions on the prowl. You stalk your unsuspecting prey... there's the quarry -- Two young women in slinky evening-wear. They are beautiful, alluring, vulnerable...

You saunter over to them and look them in the eye... you are so close to them you can feel the vibrations of their pounding hearts... their boyfriends arrive. You can feel the vibrations of your aching head as they pummel you into the
